name: AUPrimaryCareMedicalHistoryList
title: AU Primary Care Medical History List
description: This profile defines a medical history list structure that includes core localisation concepts for use in an Australian primary care practice-to-practice record transfer context.
purpose: This profile defines a medical history list structure that includes core localisation concepts for use in an Australian primary care practice-to-practice record transfer context.

element.short: A medical history list in an Australian primary care practice-to-practice record transfer context.
element.definition: A combined list of significant problems, diagnoses and procedures for the subject of care.
element.comment: To exchange information about significant diagnoses, problems and procedures for the subject of care, including one of: an absence of information; an exclusion of any significant problems, diagnoses and procedures; or a list of problem/diagnosis or procedure items
